'''Taqua''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|As you approach, the fish vendor flashes you a broad, cheery grin. He beckons you over with a wave of his hand and directs your attention to his latest delivery.}}
Taqua is a humble fisherman selling provisions at Sayuka.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Fish, at a fixed discount of -15%
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
